tool_description: Transform RSS/Atom/RDF Feeds to an JSONFeed format with full text capabilities following https://www.jsonfeed.org/ rules.
name: RSS-Atom-RDF to JSONFeed
title: RSS-Atom-RDF to JSONFeed

api_list.name: Get Full-Text JsonFeed content from url
api_list.description: This method not only parses the RSS/ATOM/RDF feeds but also full-text parses the item pages that are linked to.

api_list.name: Get JsonFeed format from url
api_list.description: Request metadata about the feed domain and a list of articles from the url source formatted in JSON following JSONFeed format.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The url of the feed target you want to extract the JSON from. Mandatory with http/s protocol.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit of Articles returned by the feed. Max 50. Default 10.
